page.title: IBM High Rate Wireless LAN Gateway (DR-E200W)

revision.text:

|manuf_rev= |availability= |type=wireless router |fcc_id=M4Y-XI-300 |ic_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=1 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_inner= |pwr_barrel_outer= |pwr_barrel_len= |pwr_vac= |pwr_ac_hz= |pwr_pol= |fla2_model= |fla2_num= |ram1=8 |ram1_brand=EtronTech |ram1_model=EM638165TS-7 |ram1_num= |ram2= |ram2_brand= |ram2_model= |ram2_num= |expansion_if_types=PCMCIA (16-bit) |expansion_pcmcia_num=1 |expansion_expresscard_num= |expansion_minipci_num= |expansion_minipcie_num= |expansion_usb_num= |jtag= |serial= |wi1_module=Z-Com XI-300 |wi1_module_if=PCMCIA (16-bit) |wi1_chip1_brand=Harris |wi1_chip1_model=HFA3841 |wi1_chip2_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip2_model= |wi1_chip3_brand=Intersil |wi1_chip3_model= |wi1_802dot11_protocols=b |wi1_ant_conn=RP-MMCX |wi1_txchains= |wi1_rxchains= |wi1_sstreams= |wi2_module= |wi2_module_if= |wi2_chip1_brand= |wi2_chip1_model= |wi2_chip2_brand= |wi2_chip2_model= |wi2_chip3_brand= |wi2_chip3_model= |wi2_802dot11_protocols= |wi2_ant_conn= |wi2_txchains= |wi2_rxchains= |wi2_sstreams= |eth_none= |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip1_brand= |eth_chip1_model= |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8019AS |eth_chip3_brand= |eth_chip3_model= |sw_cpu= |sw_brand=Marvell |sw_model=88E6050 |lan_speed=100M |lan_ports= |wan_ports= |flags= |tp_firmware= |802dot11_protocols=b |default_ssid=ANY |default_ssid_regex=^ANY$ |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=default |default_pass= |oui=00:60:B3 |oui_eth=00:30:AB |default_ch= }} [http://download.lenovo.com/ibmdl/pub/pc/pccbbs/options/hwlg-rodmst.pdf User's Guide] (dated 2001) P/N: 22P6401, FRU P/N: 22P6409 "DR-E200W" and "2976151101" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
"D144552840416 5508002640 REV: 0" and "6401" is printed on a label affixed to the LAN port casing. The board is highly similar to the [[Compaq iPAQ Connection Point CP-2W]] and the [[Netgear MR314]]. ==Images== File:IBM DR-E200W board top in case and dusty.jpg|board top in case, dusty File:IBM DR-E200W S3C4510B01-QERO CPU.jpg|Samsung CPU File:IBM DR-E200W Intel Flash.jpg|Intel Flash File:IBM DR-E200W EtronTech RAM.jpg|EtronTech RAM File:IBM DR-E200W wireless module label.jpg|wireless module label File:IBM DR-E200W RTL8019AS.jpg|Realtek 10Mbit Eth. controller File:IBM DR-E200W Marvell 88E6050 Switch.jpg|Marvell Switch File:IBM DR-E200W Lattice iM4A3-32 and stuff.jpg|Lattic iM4A3-32 and stuff File:IBM DR-E200W partial upper left board top.jpg|partial upper left board top File:IBM DR-E200W partial upper right board top dusty.jpg|partial upper right board top, dusty File:IBM DR-E200W 3p3v voltage regulator plus caps and stuff.jpg|3.3v voltage regulator File:IBM DR-E200W board top front view angled partial 1.jpg|board top, angled, partial 1 File:IBM DR-E200W board top front view angled partial 2.jpg|board top, angled, partial 2 File:IBM DR-E200W board top front view angled main.jpg|board top, angled, main File:IBM DR-E200W board top side view angled partial 1 taicon caps.jpg|side angled view, Taicon caps File:IBM DR-E200W Delta sticker.jpg|Delta sticker File:IBM DR-E200W Delta board ID.jpg|Delta board ID [[Has images::internal| ]]
